########################################################################################
#                                         											   #
# AVE MARIA 																		   #
# A Very Extensive Modification for Appropriate Realism and Improved Authenticity	   #
#                                         											   #
# Scripted Effects																	   #
#                               													   #
########################################################################################

# Written by Atreides

# NOTES/TABLE OF CONTENT:
##### 1) HEXACO TRAIT AND VARIABLE INITIAL ASSIGNEMENT
##### Effects adding the personality traits and corresponding varibles on start up for all characters OR when a character is born OR when is created through random create_character_effects

##### 2) EDUCATION PROGRESSION
##### Effects updating the proper education traits based on the corresponding character variable

##### 3) PERSONALITY TRAIT PROGRESSION
##### Effects updating the proper personality traits based on the corresponding character variable
##### Effects adding/removing personaly traits variable and updating the proper personality traits based on the corresponding character variable
##### For quick reference here are the various scripted effects modifying the HEXACO personality trait variables for each categories. It will add the variable and update the trait if needed
##### positive_gain_hexaco_honesty_humility_scale / negative_gain_hexaco_honesty_humility_scale
##### positive_gain_hexaco_emotionality_scale / negative_gain_hexaco_emotionality_scale
##### positive_gain_hexaco_extraversion_scale / negative_gain_hexaco_extraversion_scale
##### positive_gain_hexaco_agreeableness_scale / negative_gain_hexaco_agreeableness_scale
##### positive_gain_hexaco_conscientiousness_scale / negative_gain_hexaco_conscientiousness_scale
##### positive_gain_hexaco_openness_to_experience_scale / negative_gain_hexaco_openness_to_experience_scale


#############################################
# INITIAL ASSIGNEMENT						#
#############################################

hexaco_game_start_setup = {
	every_living_character = {
		limit = {
			is_adult = yes
		}
		add_hexaco_personality_trait_variable = yes
		add_random_hexaco_personality_trait = { WHO = this } 
	}
}


#############################################
# INITIAL ASSIGNEMENT						#
#############################################

## Add random HEXACO personality traits and assign corresponding variable if you do not have some by checking each category of traits and adding randomly one as well as setting up the corresponding variable
add_random_hexaco_personality_trait = {	
	$WHO$ = {
		#	Honesty-Humility			
		if = {				
			limit = {			
				NOR = {		
					has_trait = faithful
					has_trait = just
					has_trait = honest
					has_trait = generous
					has_trait = humble
					has_trait = arrogant
					has_trait = greedy
					has_trait = arbitrary
					has_trait = deceitful
					has_trait = cynical
				}		
			}			
			random_list = {			
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = faithful
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 25 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = just
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 18 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = honest
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 12 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = generous
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 7 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = humble
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 3 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = arrogant
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -3 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = greedy
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -7 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = arbitrary
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -12 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = cynical
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -18 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = deceitful
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -25 }	
				}		
			}			
		}				
		#	Emotionality			
		if = {				
			limit = {			
				NOR = {		
					has_trait = brave
					has_trait = tough
					has_trait = independent
					has_trait = selfassured
					has_trait = stable
					has_trait = vulnerable
					has_trait = anxious
					has_trait = paranoid
					has_trait = sentimental
					has_trait = craven
				}		
			}			
			random_list = {			
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = brave
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = 25 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = tough
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = 18 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = independent
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = 12 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = selfassured
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = 7 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = stable
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = 3 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = vulnerable
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = -3 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = anxious
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = -7 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = paranoid
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = -12 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = sentimental
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = -18 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = craven
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = -25 }	
				}		
			}			
		}				
		#	Extraversion			
		if = {				
			limit = {			
				NOR = {		
					has_trait = gregarious
					has_trait = lively
					has_trait = sociable
					has_trait = talkative
					has_trait = cheerful
					has_trait = passive
					has_trait = shy
					has_trait = introverted
					has_trait = quiet
					has_trait = reserved
				}		
			}			
			random_list = {			
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = gregarious
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = 25 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = lively
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = 18 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = sociable
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = 12 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = talkative
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = 7 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = cheerful
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = 3 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = passive
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = -3 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = shy
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = -7 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = introverted
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = -12 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = quiet
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = -18 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = reserved
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = -25 }	
				}		
			}			
		}				
		#	Agreeableness			
		if = {				
			limit = {			
				NOR = {		
					has_trait = patient
					has_trait = compassionate
					has_trait = forgiving
					has_trait = trusting
					has_trait = calm
					has_trait = impatient
					has_trait = vengeful
					has_trait = stubborn
					has_trait = zealous
					has_trait = wrathful
				}		
			}			
			random_list = {			
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = patient
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = 25 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = compassionate
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = 18 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = forgiving
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = 12 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = trusting
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = 7 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = calm
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = 3 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = impatient
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = -3 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = vengeful
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = -7 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = stubborn
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = -12 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = zealous
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = -18 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = wrathful
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = -25 }	
				}		
			}			
		}				
		#	Conscientiousness			
		if = {				
			limit = {			
				NOR = {		
					has_trait = organized
					has_trait = diligent
					has_trait = careful
					has_trait = thorough
					has_trait = precise
					has_trait = sloppy
					has_trait = negligent
					has_trait = reckless
					has_trait = lazy
					has_trait = fickle
				}		
			}			
			random_list = {			
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = organized
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = 25 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = diligent
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = 18 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = careful
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = 12 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = thorough
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = 7 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = precise
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = 3 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = sloppy
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = -3 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = negligent
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = -7 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = reckless
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = -12 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = lazy
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = -18 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = fickle
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = -25 }	
				}		
			}			
		}				
		#	Openness to Experience			
		if = {				
			limit = {			
				NOR = {		
					has_trait = intellectual
					has_trait = creative
					has_trait = unconventional
					has_trait = innovative
					has_trait = thoughtful
					has_trait = shallow
					has_trait = unimaginative
					has_trait = content
					has_trait = uninspired
					has_trait = simple
				}		
			}			
			random_list = {			
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = intellectual
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = 25 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = creative
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = 18 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = unconventional
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = 12 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = innovative
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = 7 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = thoughtful
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = 3 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = shallow
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = -3 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = unimaginative
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = -7 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = content
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = -12 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = uninspired
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = -18 }	
				}		
				10 = { 		
					add_trait = simple
					set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = -25 }	
				}		
			}			
		}
	}
}

add_random_hexaco_personality_trait_new = {
	#	Honesty-Humility			
	if = {				
		limit = {			
			NOR = {		
				has_trait = faithful
				has_trait = just
				has_trait = honest
				has_trait = generous
				has_trait = humble
				has_trait = arrogant
				has_trait = greedy
				has_trait = arbitrary
				has_trait = deceitful
				has_trait = cynical
			}		
		}			
		random_list = {			
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = faithful
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 25 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = just
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 18 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = honest
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = generous
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 7 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = humble
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = arrogant
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = greedy
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -7 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = arbitrary
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = cynical
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -18 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = deceitful
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -25 }	
			}		
		}			
	}				
	#	Emotionality			
	if = {				
		limit = {			
			NOR = {		
				has_trait = brave
				has_trait = tough
				has_trait = independent
				has_trait = selfassured
				has_trait = stable
				has_trait = vulnerable
				has_trait = anxious
				has_trait = paranoid
				has_trait = sentimental
				has_trait = craven
			}		
		}			
		random_list = {			
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = brave
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = 25 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = tough
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = 18 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = independent
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = 12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = selfassured
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = 7 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = stable
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = 3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = vulnerable
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = -3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = anxious
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = -7 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = paranoid
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = -12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = sentimental
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = -18 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = craven
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = -25 }	
			}		
		}			
	}				
	#	Extraversion			
	if = {				
		limit = {			
			NOR = {		
				has_trait = gregarious
				has_trait = lively
				has_trait = sociable
				has_trait = talkative
				has_trait = cheerful
				has_trait = passive
				has_trait = shy
				has_trait = introverted
				has_trait = quiet
				has_trait = reserved
			}		
		}			
		random_list = {			
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = gregarious
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = 25 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = lively
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = 18 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = sociable
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = 12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = talkative
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = 7 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = cheerful
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = 3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = passive
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = -3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = shy
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = -7 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = introverted
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = -12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = quiet
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = -18 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = reserved
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_extraversion value = -25 }	
			}		
		}			
	}				
	#	Agreeableness			
	if = {				
		limit = {			
			NOR = {		
				has_trait = patient
				has_trait = compassionate
				has_trait = forgiving
				has_trait = trusting
				has_trait = calm
				has_trait = impatient
				has_trait = vengeful
				has_trait = stubborn
				has_trait = zealous
				has_trait = wrathful
			}		
		}			
		random_list = {			
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = patient
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = 25 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = compassionate
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = 18 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = forgiving
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = 12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = trusting
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = 7 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = calm
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = 3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = impatient
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = -3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = vengeful
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = -7 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = stubborn
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = -12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = zealous
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = -18 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = wrathful
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness value = -25 }	
			}		
		}			
	}				
	#	Conscientiousness			
	if = {				
		limit = {			
			NOR = {		
				has_trait = organized
				has_trait = diligent
				has_trait = careful
				has_trait = thorough
				has_trait = precise
				has_trait = sloppy
				has_trait = negligent
				has_trait = reckless
				has_trait = lazy
				has_trait = fickle
			}		
		}			
		random_list = {			
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = organized
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = 25 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = diligent
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = 18 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = careful
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = 12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = thorough
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = 7 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = precise
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = 3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = sloppy
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = -3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = negligent
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = -7 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = reckless
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = -12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = lazy
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = -18 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = fickle
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness value = -25 }	
			}		
		}			
	}				
	#	Openness to Experience			
	if = {				
		limit = {			
			NOR = {		
				has_trait = intellectual
				has_trait = creative
				has_trait = unconventional
				has_trait = innovative
				has_trait = thoughtful
				has_trait = shallow
				has_trait = unimaginative
				has_trait = content
				has_trait = uninspired
				has_trait = simple
			}		
		}			
		random_list = {			
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = intellectual
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = 25 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = creative
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = 18 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = unconventional
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = 12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = innovative
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = 7 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = thoughtful
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = 3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = shallow
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = -3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = unimaginative
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = -7 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = content
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = -12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = uninspired
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = -18 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = simple
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience value = -25 }	
			}		
		}			
	}
}

## Add HEXACO education traits and assign corresponding variable if you do not have some by checking each category of traits and adding randomly one
add_hexaco_education_trait = {
	#	Martial Arts			
	if = {				
		limit = {			
			NOR = {		
				has_trait = martial_arts_1
				has_trait = martial_arts_2
				has_trait = martial_arts_3
				has_trait = martial_arts_4
				has_trait = martial_arts_5
			}		
		}			
		random_list = {			
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = martial_arts_1
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts value = 3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = martial_arts_2
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts value = 6 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = martial_arts_3
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts value = 9 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = martial_arts_4
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts value = 12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = martial_arts_5
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts value = 15 }	
			}		
		}			
	}				
	#	Riding			
	if = {				
		limit = {			
			NOR = {		
				has_trait = riding_1
				has_trait = riding_2
				has_trait = riding_3
				has_trait = riding_4
				has_trait = riding_5
			}		
		}			
		random_list = {			
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = riding_1
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_riding value = 3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = riding_2
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_riding value = 6 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = riding_3
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_riding value = 9 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = riding_4
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_riding value = 12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = riding_5
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_riding value = 15 }	
			}		
		}			
	}				
	#	Etiquette			
	if = {				
		limit = {			
			NOR = {		
				has_trait = etiquette_1
				has_trait = etiquette_2
				has_trait = etiquette_3
				has_trait = etiquette_4
				has_trait = etiquette_5
			}		
		}			
		random_list = {			
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = etiquette_1
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_etiquette value = 3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = etiquette_2
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_etiquette value = 6 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = etiquette_3
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_etiquette value = 9 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = etiquette_4
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_etiquette value = 12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = etiquette_5
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_etiquette value = 15 }	
			}		
		}			
	}				
	#	Read Write			
	if = {				
		limit = {			
			NOR = {		
				has_trait = read_write_1
				has_trait = read_write_2
				has_trait = read_write_3
				has_trait = read_write_4
				has_trait = read_write_5
			}		
		}			
		random_list = {			
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = read_write_1
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_read_write value = 3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = read_write_2
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_read_write value = 6 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = read_write_3
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_read_write value = 9 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = read_write_4
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_read_write value = 12 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = read_write_5
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_read_write value = 15 }	
			}		
		}			
	}				
	#	Mathematics			
	if = {				
		limit = {			
			NOR = {		
				has_trait = mathematics_1
				has_trait = mathematics_2
				has_trait = mathematics_3
				has_trait = mathematics_4
				has_trait = mathematics_5
			}		
		}			
		random_list = {			
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = mathematics_1
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_mathematics value = 3 }	
			}		
			10 = {

				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_mathematics value = 6 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = mathematics_3
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_mathematics value = 9 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = mathematics_4
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_mathematics value = 12 }	
			}		
			10 = {

				has_trait = philosophy_1
				has_trait = philosophy_2

			}		
			10 = {

			}

				has_trait = law_2

				has_trait = law_5
			}

			}

				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_law value = 6 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = law_3
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_law value = 9 }	
			}		
			10 = {

				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_law value = 12 }	
			}		
			10 = {

			}		
		}			
	}				
	#	Theology

				has_trait = theology_2

		}			
		random_list = {			
			10 = {

				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_theology value = 3 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = theology_2
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_theology value = 6 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = theology_3
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_theology value = 9 }	
			}		
			10 = { 		
				add_trait = theology_4
				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_theology value = 12 }	
			}		
			10 = {

				set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_theology value = 15 }	
			}		
		}

## Add HEXACO personality trait variable if character has randomly generated trait from the game startup or being born or other situations
add_hexaco_personality_trait_variable = {
	if = {		
		limit = {	
			has_trait = faithful
		}	
		set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 25 }	
	}		
	if = {		
		limit = {	
			has_trait = just
		}	
		set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 18 }	
	}		
	if = {		
		limit = {	
			has_trait = honest
		}	
		set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 12 }	
	}		
	if = {		
		limit = {	
			has_trait = generous
		}	
		set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 7 }	
	}		
	if = {		
		limit = {	
			has_trait = humble
		}	
		set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = 3 }	
	}		
	if = {		
		limit = {	
			has_trait = arrogant
		}	
		set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -3 }	
	}		
	if = {		
		limit = {	
			has_trait = greedy
		}	
		set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -7 }	
	}		
	if = {		
		limit = {	
			has_trait = arbitrary
		}	
		set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -12 }	
	}		
	if = {		
		limit = {	
			has_trait = cynical
		}	
		set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -18 }	
	}		
	if = {		
		limit = {	
			has_trait = deceitful
		}	
		set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility value = -25 }	
	}		
	if = {		
		limit = {	
			has_trait = brave
		}	
		set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = 25 }	
	}		
	if = {		
		limit = {	
			has_trait = tough
		}	
		set_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality value = 18 }	
	}

	}

	}

		}

	if = {		
		limit = {

		}

	}		
	if = {

		}

	}		
	if = {		
		limit = {	
			has_trait = negligent
		}

	}		
	if = {		
		limit = {

		}

		}

		}

		}

	}

		}

		}

## Add HEXACO education trait variable if character has randomly generated trait from the game startup
add_hexaco_education_trait_variable = {
	trigger_switch = {			
		on_trigger = trait		
		martial_arts_1 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts value = 3 } }		
		martial_arts_2 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts value = 6 } }		
		martial_arts_3 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts value = 9 } }		
		martial_arts_4 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts value = 12 } }		
		martial_arts_5 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts value = 15 } }		
		riding_1 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_riding value = 3 } }		
		riding_2 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_riding value = 6 } }		
		riding_3 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_riding value = 9 } }		
		riding_4 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_riding value = 12 } }		
		riding_5 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_riding value = 15 } }		
		etiquette_1 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_etiquette value = 3 } }		
		etiquette_2 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_etiquette value = 6 } }		
		etiquette_3 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_etiquette value = 9 } }		
		etiquette_4 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_etiquette value = 12 } }		
		etiquette_5 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_etiquette value = 15 } }		
		read_write_1 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_read_write value = 3 } }		
		read_write_2 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_read_write value = 6 } }		
		read_write_3 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_read_write value = 9 } }		
		read_write_4 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_read_write value = 12 } }		
		read_write_5 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_read_write value = 15 } }		
		mathematics_1 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_mathematics value = 3 } }		
		mathematics_2 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_mathematics value = 6 } }		
		mathematics_3 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_mathematics value = 9 } }		
		mathematics_4 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_mathematics value = 12 } }		
		mathematics_5 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_mathematics value = 15 } }		
		philosophy_1 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_philosophy value = 3 } }		
		philosophy_2 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_philosophy value = 6 } }		
		philosophy_3 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_philosophy value = 9 } }		
		philosophy_4 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_philosophy value = 12 } }		
		philosophy_5 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_philosophy value = 15 } }		
		law_1 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_law value = 3 } }		
		law_2 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_law value = 6 } }		
		law_3 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_law value = 9 } }		
		law_4 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_law value = 12 } }		
		law_5 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_law value = 15 } }		
		theology_1 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_theology value = 3 } }		
		theology_2 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_theology value = 6 } }		
		theology_3 = { set_variable = { name = hexaco_education_xp_theology value = 9 } }		
	}			
}

## Add HEXACO personality traits to a character based off a randomly selected parent with a chance to get a personality trait above or below those of the selected parent
## deprecated, used the command below that take a random trait each category and wheight it based off parents/guardnian traits
add_hexaco_personality_trait_from_parents_16 = {
	## Both parents are alive, take from either one of them
	if = {
		limit = {
			father = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			mother = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
		}
		## 50/50 dice roll to take traits from one parent			
		random_list = {
			50 = {
				mother = {									
					if = {								
						limit = { 							
													
							has_trait = faithful				
													
						}							
						## Roll to see which trait below or above your mother's you will get							
						random_list = {							
							## Getting 	faithful					
							5 = {						
								root = { 					
									add_trait = faithful				
									modifier = {
										add = 5			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian	
											NOT = { this = root.mother }
											has_trait = faithful
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 4			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = just		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 3			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = honest		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 2			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = generous		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 1			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = humble		
										}			
									}				
								}					
							}						
							## Getting	faithful					
							15 = {						
								root = { 					
									add_trait = faithful				
									modifier = {				
										add = 5			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = faithful		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 4			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = just		
										}			
									}

											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = faithful		
										}			
									}

										add = 4			
										any_relation = {

											NOT = { this = root.mother }

											NOT = { this = root.mother }

							5 = {						
								root = { 					
									add_trait = humble				
									modifier = {				
										add = 5			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = faithful		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 4			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = just		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 3			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = honest		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 2			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = generous		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 1			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian

									modifier = {				
										add = 1

											has_trait = honest		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 2			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = generous		
										}

											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = just		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 3			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }

										}

											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = faithful		
										}

											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = honest		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 2			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }

									modifier = {				
										add = 1			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }

										add = 2			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = generous		
										}

											has_trait = just		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 3			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = honest		
										}

											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = generous		
										}			
									}

										add = 1			
										any_relation = {

										}			
									}

											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = faithful		
										}			
									}

										add = 4			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }

										}

										any_relation = {

											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = honest		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 2			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = generous		
										}			
									}				
									modifier = {				
										add = 1			
										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.mother }		
											has_trait = humble		
										}			
									}				
								}					
							}

										add = 5

											NOT = { this = root.father }		
											has_trait = just		
										}

											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.father }		
											has_trait = humble		
										}			
									}				
								}

										}

										any_relation = {			
											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.father }		
											has_trait = honest		
										}			
									}

											NOT = { this = root.father }		
											has_trait = just		
										}

										add = 3

										}

										}

											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.father }

									}

											NOT = { this = root.father }

											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.father }		
											has_trait = generous		
										}			
									}

											type = guardian		
											NOT = { this = root.father }		
											has_trait = generous		
										}			
									}

										add = 3

									}

	}
	## Only one parent is alive - father
	if = {
		limit = {
			father = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
			mother = {
				is_alive = no
			}
		}
		father = {									
			if = {								
				limit = { 							
											
					has_trait = faithful				
											
				}							
				## Roll to see which trait below or above your father's you will get

									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}

								add = 3

									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}

								add = 2			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = generous

							modifier = {				
								add = 1

							add_trait = impatient				
							modifier = {				
								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 4			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}

									NOT = { this = root.father }

							add_trait = impatient				
							modifier = {				
								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 4			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 2			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = generous		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 1			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = humble		
								}			
							}				
						}					
					}

					5 = {						
						root = { 					
							add_trait = impatient				
							modifier = {				
								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 4			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 2			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = generous		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 1			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = humble		
								}			
							}

									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}

									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}

								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }

								add = 3

							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}

								add = 2			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.father }

	}
	## Only one parent is alive - mother
	if = {
		limit = {
			father = {
				is_alive = no
			}
			mother = {
				is_alive = yes
			}
		}
		mother = {									
			if = {								
				limit = { 							
											
					has_trait = faithful				
											
				}							
				## Roll to see which trait below or above your mother's you will get							
				random_list = {							
					## Getting 	faithful					
					5 = {

									has_trait = generous		
								}

								}			
							}

					## Getting	faithful					
					15 = {						
						root = { 					
							add_trait = faithful				
							modifier = {				
								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {

								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}

									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = generous		
								}			
							}

									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }

								add = 1

								add = 1			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = humble		
								}

									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }

								}

								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}			
							}

								add = 4			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian

								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = just		
								}

									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}

								any_relation = {

								add = 2

							}

								add = 2

							modifier = {				
								add = 1			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = humble		
								}			
							}				
						}

									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = humble		
								}			
							}

						root = { 					
							add_trait = simple				
							modifier = {				
								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 4			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 2			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = generous		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 1			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = humble		
								}			
							}				
						}					
					}						
					## Getting	simple					
					15 = {

	}
	## Both parents dead, try mentor
	if = {
		limit = {
			father = {
				is_alive = no
			}
			mother = {
				is_alive = no
			}
			any_relation = {
				type = guardian
				is_alive = yes
			}
		}
		every_relation = {
			type = guardian
			save_temporary_scope_as = guardian
		}
		scope:guardian = {									
			if = {								
				limit = { 							
											
					has_trait = faithful				
											
				}							
				## Roll to see which trait below or above your mother's you will get							
				random_list = {							
					## Getting 	faithful					
					5 = {						
						root = {

									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = generous		
								}

							add_trait = deceitful				
							modifier = {				
								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 4			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 2			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = generous		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 1			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = humble		
								}			
							}				
						}					
					}						
				}							
			}

					5 = {						
						root = { 					
							add_trait = tough				
							modifier = {				
								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 4			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 2			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = generous		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 1			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = humble		
								}			
							}				
						}					
					}

									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}

							modifier = {				
								add = 4			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = just		
								}

							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}

								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = generous

								add = 2

						}					
					}						
					## Getting	lazy					
					25 = {						
						root = { 					
							add_trait = lazy				
							modifier = {				
								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}

							modifier = {				
								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}

							add_trait = thoughtful				
							modifier = {				
								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 4			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 2			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = generous		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 1			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = humble		
								}			
							}				
						}					
					}

							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 4			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 2			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = generous		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 1			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = humble		
								}			
							}				
						}					
					}						
					## Getting	#N/A					
					25 = {						
						root = { 					
							#N/A				
							modifier = {				
								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 4			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 2			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = generous		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 1			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = humble		
								}			
							}				
						}					
					}						
					## Getting	#N/A					
					15 = {						
						root = { 					
							#N/A				
							modifier = {				
								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 4			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 2			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = generous		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 1			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = humble		
								}			
							}				
						}					
					}						
					## Getting	#N/A					
					5 = {						
						root = { 					
							#N/A				
							modifier = {				
								add = 5			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = faithful		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 4			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = just		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 3			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = honest		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 2			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = generous		
								}			
							}				
							modifier = {				
								add = 1			
								any_relation = {			
									type = guardian		
									NOT = { this = root.mother }		
									has_trait = humble		
								}			
							}				
						}					
					}						
				}							
			}								
		}									
		
	}
	## Bother parents dead, no mentor
	if = {
		limit = {
			father = {
				is_alive = no
			}
			mother = {
				is_alive = no
			}
			NOT = {
				any_relation = {
					type = guardian
					is_alive = yes
				}
			}			
		}
		add_random_hexaco_personality_trait = { WHO = this } 
	}
}

## Add HEXACO personality traits based on father/mother/guardian traits
add_hexaco_personality_trait_adolescent = {
	$WHO$ = {
		## Honesty-Humility traits							
		random_list = {							
			##	faithful					
			10 = {						
				add_trait = faithful					
				## Parents / Guardian increase chance if positive Honesty-Humility traits					
				## faithful					
				modifier = {					
					add = 20				
					trigger = { exists = $WHO$.father }				
					$WHO$.father = { is_alive = yes has_trait = faithful }				
				}					
				modifier = {					
					add = 20				
					trigger = { exists = $WHO$.mother }				
					$WHO$.mother = { is_alive = yes has_trait = faithful }				
				}					
				modifier = {					
					add = 20				
					any_relation = {				
						type = guardian			
						has_trait = faithful			
					}				
				}					
				## just					
				modifier = {					
					add = 15				
					trigger = { exists = $WHO$.father }				
					$WHO$.father = { is_alive = yes has_trait = just }				
				}					
				modifier = {					
					add = 15				
					trigger = { exists = $WHO$.mother }				
					$WHO$.mother = { is_alive = yes has_trait = just }				
				}					
				modifier = {					
					add = 15				
					any_relation = {				
						type = guardian			
						has_trait = just			
					}				
				}					
				## honest					
				modifier = {					
					add = 10				
					trigger = { exists = $WHO$.father }				
					$WHO$.father = { is_alive = yes has_trait = honest }				
				}					
				modifier = {					
					add = 10				
					trigger = { exists = $WHO$.mother }				
					$WHO$.mother = { is_alive = yes has_trait = honest }				
				}					
				modifier = {

						type = guardian

					}				
				}					
				## generous

				}					
				modifier = {					
					add = 3				
					any_relation = {				
						type = guardian			
						has_trait = innovative			
					}				
				}					
			}
