## Remove all traits
remove_all_traits = {
	remove_trait = faithful
	remove_trait = just
	remove_trait = honest
	remove_trait = generous
	remove_trait = humble
	remove_trait = arrogant
	remove_trait = greedy
	remove_trait = arbitrary
	remove_trait = cynical
	remove_trait = deceitful
	remove_trait = brave
	remove_trait = tough
	remove_trait = independent
	remove_trait = selfassured
	remove_trait = stable
	remove_trait = vulnerable
	remove_trait = anxious
	remove_trait = paranoid
	remove_trait = sentimental
	remove_trait = craven
	remove_trait = gregarious
	remove_trait = lively
	remove_trait = sociable
	remove_trait = talkative
	remove_trait = cheerful
	remove_trait = passive
	remove_trait = shy
	remove_trait = reserved
	remove_trait = quiet
	remove_trait = introverted
	remove_trait = forgiving
	remove_trait = compassionate
	remove_trait = patient
	remove_trait = trusting
	remove_trait = calm
	remove_trait = impatient
	remove_trait = vengeful
	remove_trait = stubborn
	remove_trait = zealous
	remove_trait = wrathful
	remove_trait = organized
	remove_trait = diligent
	remove_trait = careful
	remove_trait = thorough
	remove_trait = precise
	remove_trait = sloppy
	remove_trait = negligent
	remove_trait = reckless
	remove_trait = lazy
	remove_trait = fickle
	remove_trait = intellectual
	remove_trait = creative
	remove_trait = unconventional
	remove_trait = innovative
	remove_trait = thoughtful
	remove_trait = shallow
	remove_trait = unimaginative
	remove_trait = content
	remove_trait = uninspired
	remove_trait = simple

}

#############################################
# EDUCATION TRAIT PROGRESSION	 			#
#############################################

## Assign the proper education trait depending on the variable detected on the character

## Updates the corresponding level of Martial arts trait depending on the character martial variable xp
update_hexaco_martial_arts_trait = {
	if = {	#	Martial Arts 1		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts >= 3		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts < 7		
			NOT = { has_trait = martial_arts_1 }		
		}
		remove_trait = martial_arts_1
		remove_trait = martial_arts_2
		remove_trait = martial_arts_3
		remove_trait = martial_arts_4
		remove_trait = martial_arts_5

		add_trait = martial_arts_1			
	}				
	if = {	#	Martial Arts 2		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts >= 7	
			var:hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts < 11		
			NOT = { has_trait = martial_arts_2 }		
		}			
		remove_trait = martial_arts_1
		remove_trait = martial_arts_2
		remove_trait = martial_arts_3
		remove_trait = martial_arts_4
		remove_trait = martial_arts_5

		add_trait = martial_arts_2			
	}				
	if = {	#	Martial Arts 3		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts >= 12		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts < 16		
			NOT = { has_trait = martial_arts_3 }		
		}
		remove_trait = martial_arts_1
		remove_trait = martial_arts_2
		remove_trait = martial_arts_3
		remove_trait = martial_arts_4
		remove_trait = martial_arts_5

		add_trait = martial_arts_3			
	}				
	if = {	#	Martial Arts 4		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts  >= 18		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts < 22		
			NOT = { has_trait = martial_arts_4 }		
		}
		remove_trait = martial_arts_1
		remove_trait = martial_arts_2
		remove_trait = martial_arts_3
		remove_trait = martial_arts_4
		remove_trait = martial_arts_5

		add_trait = martial_arts_4			
	}				
	if = {	#	Martial Arts 5		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_martial_arts >= 25				
			NOT = { has_trait = martial_arts_5 }		
		}
		remove_trait = martial_arts_1
		remove_trait = martial_arts_2
		remove_trait = martial_arts_3
		remove_trait = martial_arts_4
		remove_trait = martial_arts_5

		add_trait = martial_arts_5			
	}			
}

## Updates the corresponding level of Riding trait depending on the character riding variable xp
update_hexaco_riding_trait = {

	if = {	#	Riding 1		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_riding >= 3		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_riding < 7		
			NOT = { has_trait = riding_1 }		
		}	
		remove_trait = riding_1
		remove_trait = riding_2
		remove_trait = riding_3
		remove_trait = riding_4
		remove_trait = riding_5

		add_trait = riding_1			
	}				
	if = {	#	Riding 2		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_riding >= 7	
			var:hexaco_education_xp_riding < 11		
			NOT = { has_trait = riding_2 }		
		}			
		remove_trait = riding_1
		remove_trait = riding_2
		remove_trait = riding_3
		remove_trait = riding_4
		remove_trait = riding_5

		add_trait = riding_2			
	}				
	if = {	#	Riding 4		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_riding  >= 18		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_riding < 22		
			NOT = { has_trait = riding_4 }		
		}
		remove_trait = riding_1
		remove_trait = riding_2
		remove_trait = riding_3
		remove_trait = riding_4
		remove_trait = riding_5

		add_trait = riding_4			
	}				
	if = {	#	Riding 5		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_riding >= 25
			NOT = { has_trait = riding_5 }		
		}			
		remove_trait = riding_1
		remove_trait = riding_2
		remove_trait = riding_3
		remove_trait = riding_4
		remove_trait = riding_5

		add_trait = riding_5			
	}				


}

## Updates the corresponding level of Etiquette trait depending on the character etiquette variable xp
update_hexaco_etiquette_trait = {
	
	if = {	#	Etiquette 1			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_etiquette >= 3			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_etiquette < 7			
			NOT = { has_trait = etiquette_1 }			
		}				
		remove_trait = etiquette_1
		remove_trait = etiquette_2
		remove_trait = etiquette_3
		remove_trait = etiquette_4
		remove_trait = etiquette_5

		add_trait = etiquette_1				
	}					
	if = {	#	Etiquette 2			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_etiquette >= 7		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_etiquette < 11			
			NOT = { has_trait = etiquette_2 }			
		}				
		remove_trait = etiquette_1
		remove_trait = etiquette_2
		remove_trait = etiquette_3
		remove_trait = etiquette_4
		remove_trait = etiquette_5
		add_trait = etiquette_2				
	}					
	if = {	#	Etiquette 3			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_etiquette >= 12			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_etiquette < 16			
			NOT = { has_trait = etiquette_3 }			
		}				
		remove_trait = etiquette_1
		remove_trait = etiquette_2
		remove_trait = etiquette_3
		remove_trait = etiquette_4
		remove_trait = etiquette_5
		add_trait = etiquette_3				
	}					
	if = {	#	Etiquette 4			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_etiquette  >= 18			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_etiquette < 22			
			NOT = { has_trait = etiquette_4 }			
		}				
		remove_trait = etiquette_1
		remove_trait = etiquette_2
		remove_trait = etiquette_3
		remove_trait = etiquette_4
		remove_trait = etiquette_5
		add_trait = etiquette_4				
	}					
	if = {	#	Etiquette 5			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_etiquette >= 25					
			NOT = { has_trait = etiquette_5 }			
		}
		remove_trait = etiquette_1
		remove_trait = etiquette_2
		remove_trait = etiquette_3
		remove_trait = etiquette_4
		remove_trait = etiquette_5
		add_trait = etiquette_5				
	}					

}

## Updates the corresponding level of Read/Write trait depending on the character of Read/Write variable xp
update_hexaco_read_write_trait = {
	if = {	#	Read Write 1		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_read_write >= 3		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_read_write < 7		
			NOT = { has_trait = read_write_1 }		
		}			
		remove_trait = read_write_1
		remove_trait = read_write_2
		remove_trait = read_write_3
		remove_trait = read_write_4
		remove_trait = read_write_5
		add_trait = read_write_1			
	}				
	if = {	#	Read Write 2		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_read_write >= 7	
			var:hexaco_education_xp_read_write < 11		
			NOT = { has_trait = read_write_2 }		
		}			
		remove_trait = read_write_1
		remove_trait = read_write_2
		remove_trait = read_write_3
		remove_trait = read_write_4
		remove_trait = read_write_5
		add_trait = read_write_2			
	}				
	if = {	#	Read Write 3		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_read_write >= 12		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_read_write < 16		
			NOT = { has_trait = read_write_3 }		
		}			
		remove_trait = read_write_1
		remove_trait = read_write_2
		remove_trait = read_write_3
		remove_trait = read_write_4
		remove_trait = read_write_5
		add_trait = read_write_3			
	}				
	if = {	#	Read Write 4		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_read_write  >= 18		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_read_write < 22		
			NOT = { has_trait = read_write_4 }		
		}			
		remove_trait = read_write_1
		remove_trait = read_write_2
		remove_trait = read_write_3
		remove_trait = read_write_4
		remove_trait = read_write_5
		add_trait = read_write_4			
	}				
	if = {	#	Read Write 5		
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_read_write >= 25			
			NOT = { has_trait = read_write_5 }		
		}			
		remove_trait = read_write_1
		remove_trait = read_write_2
		remove_trait = read_write_3
		remove_trait = read_write_4
		remove_trait = read_write_5
		add_trait = read_write_5			
	}				

}

## Updates the corresponding level of Mathematics trait depending on the character Mathematics variable 
update_hexaco_mathematics_trait = {
	if = {	#	Mathematics 1	
		limit = {		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_mathematics >= 3	
			var:hexaco_education_xp_mathematics < 7	
			NOT = { has_trait = mathematics_1 }	
		}		
		remove_trait = mathematics_1
		remove_trait = mathematics_2
		remove_trait = mathematics_3
		remove_trait = mathematics_4
		remove_trait = mathematics_5
		add_trait = mathematics_1		
	}			
	if = {	#	Mathematics 2	
		limit = {		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_mathematics >= 7
			var:hexaco_education_xp_mathematics < 11	
			NOT = { has_trait = mathematics_2 }	
		}		
		remove_trait = mathematics_1
		remove_trait = mathematics_2
		remove_trait = mathematics_3
		remove_trait = mathematics_4
		remove_trait = mathematics_5
		add_trait = mathematics_2		
	}			
	if = {	#	Mathematics 3	
		limit = {		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_mathematics >= 12	
			var:hexaco_education_xp_mathematics < 16	
			NOT = { has_trait = mathematics_3 }	
		}		
		remove_trait = mathematics_1
		remove_trait = mathematics_2
		remove_trait = mathematics_3
		remove_trait = mathematics_4
		remove_trait = mathematics_5
		add_trait = mathematics_3		
	}			
	if = {	#	Mathematics 4	
		limit = {		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_mathematics  >= 18	
			var:hexaco_education_xp_mathematics < 22	
			NOT = { has_trait = mathematics_4 }	
		}		
		remove_trait = mathematics_1
		remove_trait = mathematics_2
		remove_trait = mathematics_3
		remove_trait = mathematics_4
		remove_trait = mathematics_5
		add_trait = mathematics_4		
	}			
	if = {	#	Mathematics 5	
		limit = {		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_mathematics >= 25	
			NOT = { has_trait = mathematics_5 }	
		}		
		remove_trait = mathematics_1
		remove_trait = mathematics_2
		remove_trait = mathematics_3
		remove_trait = mathematics_4
		remove_trait = mathematics_5
		add_trait = mathematics_5		
	}			

}

## Updates the corresponding level of Philosophy trait depending on the character Philosophy variable 
update_hexaco_philosophy_trait = {
	if = {	#	Philosophy 1	
		limit = {		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_philosophy >= 3	
			var:hexaco_education_xp_philosophy < 7	
			NOT = { has_trait = philosophy_1 }	
		}		
		remove_trait = philosophy_1
		remove_trait = philosophy_2
		remove_trait = philosophy_3
		remove_trait = philosophy_4
		remove_trait = philosophy_5		
		add_trait = philosophy_1		
	}			
	if = {	#	Philosophy 2	
		limit = {		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_philosophy >= 7
			var:hexaco_education_xp_philosophy < 11	
			NOT = { has_trait = philosophy_2 }	
		}		
		remove_trait = philosophy_1
		remove_trait = philosophy_2
		remove_trait = philosophy_3
		remove_trait = philosophy_4
		remove_trait = philosophy_5	
		add_trait = philosophy_2		
	}			
	if = {	#	Philosophy 3	
		limit = {		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_philosophy >= 12	
			var:hexaco_education_xp_philosophy < 16	
			NOT = { has_trait = philosophy_3 }	
		}		
		remove_trait = philosophy_1
		remove_trait = philosophy_2
		remove_trait = philosophy_3
		remove_trait = philosophy_4
		remove_trait = philosophy_5	
		add_trait = philosophy_3		
	}			
	if = {	#	Philosophy 4	
		limit = {		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_philosophy  >= 18	
			var:hexaco_education_xp_philosophy < 22	
			NOT = { has_trait = philosophy_4 }	
		}		
		remove_trait = philosophy_1
		remove_trait = philosophy_2
		remove_trait = philosophy_3
		remove_trait = philosophy_4
		remove_trait = philosophy_5	
		add_trait = philosophy_4		
	}			
	if = {	#	Philosophy 5	
		limit = {		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_philosophy >= 25	
			var:hexaco_education_xp_philosophy < 29	
			NOT = { has_trait = philosophy_5 }	
		}
		remove_trait = philosophy_1
		remove_trait = philosophy_2
		remove_trait = philosophy_3
		remove_trait = philosophy_4
		remove_trait = philosophy_5	
		add_trait = philosophy_5		
	}			

}

## Updates the corresponding level of Law trait depending on the character Law variable 
update_hexaco_law_trait = {
	if = {	#	Law 1			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_law >= 3			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_law < 7			
			NOT = { has_trait = law_1 }			
		}
		remove_trait = law_1
		remove_trait = law_2
		remove_trait = law_3
		remove_trait = law_4
		remove_trait = law_5						
		add_trait = law_1				
	}					
	if = {	#	Law 2			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_law >= 7		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_law < 11			
			NOT = { has_trait = law_2 }			
		}				
		remove_trait = law_1
		remove_trait = law_2
		remove_trait = law_3
		remove_trait = law_4
		remove_trait = law_5
		add_trait = law_2				
	}					
	if = {	#	Law 3			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_law >= 12			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_law < 16			
			NOT = { has_trait = law_3 }			
		}				
		remove_trait = law_1
		remove_trait = law_2
		remove_trait = law_3
		remove_trait = law_4
		remove_trait = law_5
		add_trait = law_3				
	}					
	if = {	#	Law 4			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_law  >= 18			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_law < 22			
			NOT = { has_trait = law_4 }			
		}				
		remove_trait = law_1
		remove_trait = law_2
		remove_trait = law_3
		remove_trait = law_4
		remove_trait = law_5
		add_trait = law_4				
	}					
	if = {	#	Law 5			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_law >= 25					
			NOT = { has_trait = law_5 }			
		}				
		remove_trait = law_1
		remove_trait = law_2
		remove_trait = law_3
		remove_trait = law_4
		remove_trait = law_5
		add_trait = law_5				
	}					

}

## Updates the corresponding level of Theology trait depending on the character Theology variable 
update_hexaco_theology_trait = {
	if = {	#	Theology 1			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_theology >= 3			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_theology < 7			
			NOT = { has_trait = theology_1 }			
		}
		remove_trait = theology_1
		remove_trait = theology_2
		remove_trait = theology_3
		remove_trait = theology_4
		remove_trait = theology_5						
		add_trait = theology_1				
	}					
	if = {	#	Theology 2			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_theology >= 7		
			var:hexaco_education_xp_theology < 11			
			NOT = { has_trait = theology_2 }			
		}				
		remove_trait = theology_1
		remove_trait = theology_2
		remove_trait = theology_3
		remove_trait = theology_4
		remove_trait = theology_5
		add_trait = theology_2				
	}					
	if = {	#	Theology 3			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_theology >= 12			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_theology < 16			
			NOT = { has_trait = theology_3 }			
		}				
		remove_trait = theology_1
		remove_trait = theology_2
		remove_trait = theology_3
		remove_trait = theology_4
		remove_trait = theology_5
		add_trait = theology_3				
	}					
	if = {	#	Theology 4			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_theology  >= 18			
			var:hexaco_education_xp_theology < 22			
			NOT = { has_trait = theology_4 }			
		}				
		remove_trait = theology_1
		remove_trait = theology_2
		remove_trait = theology_3
		remove_trait = theology_4
		remove_trait = theology_5
		add_trait = theology_4				
	}					
	if = {	#	Theology 5			
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_education_xp_theology >= 25					
			NOT = { has_trait = theology_5 }			
		}				
		remove_trait = theology_1
		remove_trait = theology_2
		remove_trait = theology_3
		remove_trait = theology_4
		remove_trait = theology_5
		add_trait = theology_5				
	}					

}


#############################################
# PERSONALITY TRAIT PROGRESSION	 			#
#############################################

#### Updates the proper personality trait depending on the variable detected on the character

## Updates the corresponding level of Honest Humility trait depending on the character related scale variable (can be changed through events or other scripted effects)
update_hexaco_honesty_humility_trait = {
	if = {	#	faithful	Honesty-Humility	
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility >= 25		
			NOT = { has_trait = faithful }
		}			
		remove_trait = faithful			
		remove_trait = just			
		remove_trait = honest			
		remove_trait = generous			
		remove_trait = humble			
		remove_trait = arrogant			
		remove_trait = greedy			
		remove_trait = arbitrary			
		remove_trait = deceitful			
		remove_trait = cynical			
		add_trait = faithful			
	}				
	if = {	#	honest	Honesty-Humility	
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility >= 18		
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility < 25		
			NOT = { has_trait = just }		
		}			
		remove_trait = faithful			
		remove_trait = just			
		remove_trait = honest			
		remove_trait = generous			
		remove_trait = humble			
		remove_trait = arrogant			
		remove_trait = greedy			
		remove_trait = arbitrary			
		remove_trait = deceitful			
		remove_trait = cynical			
		add_trait = just			
	}				
	if = {	#	sincere	Honesty-Humility	
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility >= 12		
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility < 18		
			NOT = { has_trait = honest }		
		}			
		remove_trait = faithful			
		remove_trait = just			
		remove_trait = honest			
		remove_trait = generous			
		remove_trait = humble			
		remove_trait = arrogant			
		remove_trait = greedy			
		remove_trait = arbitrary			
		remove_trait = deceitful			
		remove_trait = cynical			
		add_trait = honest			
	}				
	if = {	#	generous	Honesty-Humility	
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility >= 7	
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility < 12		
			NOT = { has_trait = generous }		
		}			
		remove_trait = faithful			
		remove_trait = just			
		remove_trait = honest			
		remove_trait = generous			
		remove_trait = humble			
		remove_trait = arrogant			
		remove_trait = greedy			
		remove_trait = arbitrary			
		remove_trait = deceitful			
		remove_trait = cynical			
		add_trait = generous			
	}				
	if = {	#	humble	Honesty-Humility	
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility >= 3		
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility < 7		
			NOT = { has_trait = humble }		
		}			
		remove_trait = faithful			
		remove_trait = just			
		remove_trait = honest			
		remove_trait = generous			
		remove_trait = humble			
		remove_trait = arrogant			
		remove_trait = greedy			
		remove_trait = arbitrary			
		remove_trait = deceitful			
		remove_trait = cynical			
		add_trait = humble			
	}				
	if = {	#	pretentious	Honesty-Humility	
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility >= -3		
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility < 3		
			NOT = { has_trait = arrogant }		
		}			
		remove_trait = faithful			
		remove_trait = just			
		remove_trait = honest			
		remove_trait = generous			
		remove_trait = humble			
		remove_trait = arrogant			
		remove_trait = greedy			
		remove_trait = arbitrary			
		remove_trait = deceitful			
		remove_trait = cynical			
		add_trait = arrogant			
	}				
	if = {	#	greedy	Honesty-Humility	
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility >= -7		
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility < -3		
			NOT = { has_trait = greedy }		
		}			
		remove_trait = faithful			
		remove_trait = just			
		remove_trait = honest			
		remove_trait = generous			
		remove_trait = humble			
		remove_trait = arrogant			
		remove_trait = greedy			
		remove_trait = arbitrary			
		remove_trait = deceitful			
		remove_trait = cynical			
		add_trait = greedy			
	}				
	if = {	#	inconstant	Honesty-Humility	
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility >= -12		
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility < -7		
			NOT = { has_trait = arbitrary }		
		}			
		remove_trait = faithful			
		remove_trait = just			
		remove_trait = honest			
		remove_trait = generous			
		remove_trait = humble			
		remove_trait = arrogant			
		remove_trait = greedy			
		remove_trait = arbitrary			
		remove_trait = deceitful			
		remove_trait = cynical			
		add_trait = arbitrary			
	}				
	if = {	#	deceitful	Honesty-Humility	
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility >= -18		
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility < -12	
			NOT = { has_trait = deceitful }		
		}			
		remove_trait = faithful			
		remove_trait = just			
		remove_trait = honest			
		remove_trait = generous			
		remove_trait = humble			
		remove_trait = arrogant			
		remove_trait = greedy			
		remove_trait = arbitrary			
		remove_trait = deceitful			
		remove_trait = cynical			
		add_trait = deceitful			
	}				
	if = {	#	hypocritical	Honesty-Humility	
		limit = {			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility < -18	
			NOT = { has_trait = cynical }		
		}			
		remove_trait = faithful			
		remove_trait = just			
		remove_trait = honest			
		remove_trait = generous			
		remove_trait = humble			
		remove_trait = arrogant			
		remove_trait = greedy			
		remove_trait = arbitrary			
		remove_trait = deceitful			
		remove_trait = cynical			
		add_trait = cynical			
	}				

}

## Updates the corresponding level of Emotionality trait depending on the character related scale variable (can be changed through events or other scripted effects)
update_hexaco_emotionality_trait = { 
	if = {	#	brave	Emotionality		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality >= 25			
			NOT = { has_trait = brave }			
		}				
		remove_trait = brave				
		remove_trait = tough				
		remove_trait = independent				
		remove_trait = selfassured				
		remove_trait = stable				
		remove_trait = vulnerable
		remove_trait = anxious				
		remove_trait = paranoid				
		remove_trait = sentimental				
		remove_trait = craven				
		add_trait = brave				
	}					
	if = {	#	tough	Emotionality		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality  >= 18			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality < 25			
			NOT = { has_trait = tough }			
		}				
		remove_trait = brave				
		remove_trait = tough				
		remove_trait = independent				
		remove_trait = selfassured				
		remove_trait = stable				
		remove_trait = vulnerable		
		remove_trait = anxious				
		remove_trait = paranoid				
		remove_trait = sentimental				
		remove_trait = craven				
		add_trait = tough				
	}					
	if = {	#	independent	Emotionality		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality >= 12			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality < 18			
			NOT = { has_trait = independent }			
		}				
		remove_trait = brave				
		remove_trait = tough				
		remove_trait = independent				
		remove_trait = selfassured				
		remove_trait = stable				
		remove_trait = vulnerable			
		remove_trait = anxious				
		remove_trait = paranoid				
		remove_trait = sentimental				
		remove_trait = craven				
		add_trait = independent				
	}					
	if = {	#	selfassured	Emotionality		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality >= 7		
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality < 12			
			NOT = { has_trait = selfassured }			
		}				
		remove_trait = brave				
		remove_trait = tough				
		remove_trait = independent				
		remove_trait = selfassured				
		remove_trait = stable				
		remove_trait = vulnerable		
		remove_trait = anxious				
		remove_trait = paranoid				
		remove_trait = sentimental				
		remove_trait = craven				
		add_trait = selfassured				
	}					
	if = {	#	stable	Emotionality		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality >= 3			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality < 7			
			NOT = { has_trait = stable }			
		}				
		remove_trait = brave				
		remove_trait = tough				
		remove_trait = independent				
		remove_trait = selfassured				
		remove_trait = stable				
		remove_trait = vulnerable		
		remove_trait = anxious				
		remove_trait = paranoid				
		remove_trait = sentimental				
		remove_trait = craven				
		add_trait = stable				
	}					
	if = {	#	vulnerable�	Emotionality		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality >= -3			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality < 3			
			NOT = { has_trait = vulnerable }			
		}				
		remove_trait = brave				
		remove_trait = tough				
		remove_trait = independent				
		remove_trait = selfassured				
		remove_trait = stable				
		remove_trait = vulnerable		
		remove_trait = anxious				
		remove_trait = paranoid				
		remove_trait = sentimental				
		remove_trait = craven				
		add_trait = vulnerable			
	}					
	if = {	#	anxious	Emotionality		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality >= -7			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality < -3			
			NOT = { has_trait = anxious }			
		}				
		remove_trait = brave				
		remove_trait = tough				
		remove_trait = independent				
		remove_trait = selfassured				
		remove_trait = stable				
		remove_trait = vulnerable			
		remove_trait = anxious				
		remove_trait = paranoid				
		remove_trait = sentimental				
		remove_trait = craven				
		add_trait = anxious				
	}					
	if = {	#	fearful	Emotionality		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality >= -12			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality < -7			
			NOT = { has_trait = paranoid }			
		}				
		remove_trait = brave				
		remove_trait = tough				
		remove_trait = independent				
		remove_trait = selfassured				
		remove_trait = stable				
		remove_trait = vulnerable
		remove_trait = anxious				
		remove_trait = paranoid				
		remove_trait = sentimental				
		remove_trait = craven				
		add_trait = paranoid				
	}					
	if = {	#	sentimental	Emotionality		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality >= -18			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality < -12	
			NOT = { has_trait = sentimental }			
		}				
		remove_trait = brave				
		remove_trait = tough				
		remove_trait = independent				
		remove_trait = selfassured				
		remove_trait = stable				
		remove_trait = vulnerable
		remove_trait = anxious				
		remove_trait = paranoid				
		remove_trait = sentimental				
		remove_trait = craven				
		add_trait = sentimental				
	}					
	if = {	#	craven	Emotionality		
		limit = {
			var:hexaco_personality_value_emotionality < -18		
			NOT = { has_trait = craven }			
		}				
		remove_trait = brave				
		remove_trait = tough				
		remove_trait = independent				
		remove_trait = selfassured				
		remove_trait = stable				
		remove_trait = vulnerable
		remove_trait = anxious				
		remove_trait = paranoid				
		remove_trait = sentimental				
		remove_trait = craven				
		add_trait = craven				
	}					

}

## Updates the corresponding level of Extraversion trait depending on the character related scale variable (can be changed through events or other scripted effects)
update_hexaco_extraversion_trait = {
	if = {	#	outgoing	Extraversion		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion >= 25				
			NOT = { has_trait = gregarious }			
		}				
		remove_trait = gregarious				
		remove_trait = lively				
		remove_trait = sociable				
		remove_trait = talkative				
		remove_trait = cheerful				
		remove_trait = passive				
		remove_trait = shy				
		remove_trait = introverted				
		remove_trait = quiet				
		remove_trait = reserved				
		add_trait = gregarious				
	}					
	if = {	#	lively	Extraversion		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion  >= 18			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion < 25			
			NOT = { has_trait = lively }			
		}				
		remove_trait = gregarious				
		remove_trait = lively				
		remove_trait = sociable				
		remove_trait = talkative				
		remove_trait = cheerful				
		remove_trait = passive				
		remove_trait = shy				
		remove_trait = introverted				
		remove_trait = quiet				
		remove_trait = reserved				
		add_trait = lively				
	}					
	if = {	#	sociable	Extraversion		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion >= 12			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion < 18			
			NOT = { has_trait = sociable }			
		}				
		remove_trait = gregarious				
		remove_trait = lively				
		remove_trait = sociable				
		remove_trait = talkative				
		remove_trait = cheerful				
		remove_trait = passive				
		remove_trait = shy				
		remove_trait = introverted				
		remove_trait = quiet				
		remove_trait = reserved				
		add_trait = sociable				
	}					
	if = {	#	talkative	Extraversion		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion >= 7		
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion < 12			
			NOT = { has_trait = talkative }			
		}				
		remove_trait = gregarious				
		remove_trait = lively				
		remove_trait = sociable				
		remove_trait = talkative				
		remove_trait = cheerful				
		remove_trait = passive				
		remove_trait = shy				
		remove_trait = introverted				
		remove_trait = quiet				
		remove_trait = reserved				
		add_trait = talkative				
	}					
	if = {	#	cheerful	Extraversion		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion >= 3			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion < 7			
			NOT = { has_trait = cheerful }			
		}				
		remove_trait = gregarious				
		remove_trait = lively				
		remove_trait = sociable				
		remove_trait = talkative				
		remove_trait = cheerful				
		remove_trait = passive				
		remove_trait = shy				
		remove_trait = introverted				
		remove_trait = quiet				
		remove_trait = reserved				
		add_trait = cheerful				
	}					
	if = {	#	passive	Extraversion		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion >= -3			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion < 3			
			NOT = { has_trait = passive }			
		}				
		remove_trait = gregarious				
		remove_trait = lively				
		remove_trait = sociable				
		remove_trait = talkative				
		remove_trait = cheerful				
		remove_trait = passive				
		remove_trait = shy				
		remove_trait = introverted				
		remove_trait = quiet				
		remove_trait = reserved				
		add_trait = passive				
	}					
	if = {	#	withdrawn	Extraversion		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion >= -7			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion < -3			
			NOT = { has_trait = shy }			
		}				
		remove_trait = gregarious				
		remove_trait = lively				
		remove_trait = sociable				
		remove_trait = talkative				
		remove_trait = cheerful				
		remove_trait = passive				
		remove_trait = shy				
		remove_trait = introverted				
		remove_trait = quiet				
		remove_trait = reserved				
		add_trait = shy				
	}					
	if = {	#	introverted	Extraversion		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion >= -12			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion < -7			
			NOT = { has_trait = introverted }			
		}				
		remove_trait = gregarious				
		remove_trait = lively				
		remove_trait = sociable				
		remove_trait = talkative				
		remove_trait = cheerful				
		remove_trait = passive				
		remove_trait = shy				
		remove_trait = introverted				
		remove_trait = quiet				
		remove_trait = reserved				
		add_trait = introverted				
	}					
	if = {	#	quiet	Extraversion		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion >= -18			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion < -12		
			NOT = { has_trait = quiet }			
		}				
		remove_trait = gregarious				
		remove_trait = lively				
		remove_trait = sociable				
		remove_trait = talkative				
		remove_trait = cheerful				
		remove_trait = passive				
		remove_trait = shy				
		remove_trait = introverted				
		remove_trait = quiet				
		remove_trait = reserved				
		add_trait = quiet				
	}					
	if = {	#	reserved	Extraversion		
		limit = {				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_extraversion < -18		
			NOT = { has_trait = reserved }			
		}				
		remove_trait = gregarious				
		remove_trait = lively				
		remove_trait = sociable				
		remove_trait = talkative				
		remove_trait = cheerful				
		remove_trait = passive				
		remove_trait = shy				
		remove_trait = introverted				
		remove_trait = quiet				
		remove_trait = reserved				
		add_trait = reserved				
	}					

}

## Updates the corresponding level of Agreeableness trait depending on the character related scale variable (can be changed through events or other scripted effects)
update_hexaco_agreeableness_trait = {
	if = {	#	patient	Agreeableness			
		limit = {					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness >= 25			
			NOT = { has_trait = patient }				
		}					
		remove_trait = patient					
		remove_trait = compassionate					
		remove_trait = forgiving					
		remove_trait = trusting					
		remove_trait = calm					
		remove_trait = impatient					
		remove_trait = vengeful					
		remove_trait = stubborn					
		remove_trait = zealous					
		remove_trait = wrathful					
		add_trait = patient					
	}						
	if = {	#	tolerant	Agreeableness			
		limit = {					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness  >= 18				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness < 25				
			NOT = { has_trait = compassionate }				
		}					
		remove_trait = patient					
		remove_trait = compassionate					
		remove_trait = forgiving					
		remove_trait = trusting					
		remove_trait = calm					
		remove_trait = impatient					
		remove_trait = vengeful					
		remove_trait = stubborn					
		remove_trait = zealous					
		remove_trait = wrathful					
		add_trait = compassionate					
	}						
	if = {	#	agreeable	Agreeableness			
		limit = {					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness >= 12				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness < 18				
			NOT = { has_trait = forgiving }				
		}					
		remove_trait = patient					
		remove_trait = compassionate					
		remove_trait = forgiving					
		remove_trait = trusting					
		remove_trait = calm					
		remove_trait = impatient					
		remove_trait = vengeful					
		remove_trait = stubborn					
		remove_trait = zealous					
		remove_trait = wrathful					
		add_trait = forgiving					
	}						
	if = {	#	mild	Agreeableness			
		limit = {					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness >= 7			
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness < 12				
			NOT = { has_trait = trusting }				
		}					
		remove_trait = patient					
		remove_trait = compassionate					
		remove_trait = forgiving					
		remove_trait = trusting					
		remove_trait = calm					
		remove_trait = impatient					
		remove_trait = vengeful					
		remove_trait = stubborn					
		remove_trait = zealous					
		remove_trait = wrathful					
		add_trait = trusting					
	}						
	if = {	#	gentle	Agreeableness			
		limit = {					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness >= 3				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness < 10				
			NOT = { has_trait = calm }				
		}					
		remove_trait = patient					
		remove_trait = compassionate					
		remove_trait = forgiving					
		remove_trait = trusting					
		remove_trait = calm					
		remove_trait = impatient					
		remove_trait = vengeful					
		remove_trait = stubborn					
		remove_trait = zealous					
		remove_trait = wrathful					
		add_trait = calm					
	}						
	if = {	#	illtempered	Agreeableness			
		limit = {					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness >= -3				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness < 3				
			NOT = { has_trait = impatient }				
		}					
		remove_trait = patient					
		remove_trait = compassionate					
		remove_trait = forgiving					
		remove_trait = trusting					
		remove_trait = calm					
		remove_trait = impatient					
		remove_trait = vengeful					
		remove_trait = stubborn					
		remove_trait = zealous					
		remove_trait = wrathful					
		add_trait = impatient					
	}						
	if = {	#	quarrelsome	Agreeableness			
		limit = {					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness >= -7				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness < -3				
			NOT = { has_trait = vengeful }				
		}					
		remove_trait = patient					
		remove_trait = compassionate					
		remove_trait = forgiving					
		remove_trait = trusting					
		remove_trait = calm					
		remove_trait = impatient					
		remove_trait = vengeful					
		remove_trait = stubborn					
		remove_trait = zealous					
		remove_trait = wrathful					
		add_trait = vengeful					
	}						
	if = {	#	stubborn	Agreeableness			
		limit = {					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness >= -12				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness < -7				
			NOT = { has_trait = stubborn }				
		}					
		remove_trait = patient					
		remove_trait = compassionate					
		remove_trait = forgiving					
		remove_trait = trusting					
		remove_trait = calm					
		remove_trait = impatient					
		remove_trait = vengeful					
		remove_trait = stubborn					
		remove_trait = zealous					
		remove_trait = wrathful					
		add_trait = stubborn					
	}						
	if = {	#	intolerant	Agreeableness			
		limit = {					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness >= -18				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness < -12			
			NOT = { has_trait = zealous }				
		}					
		remove_trait = patient					
		remove_trait = compassionate					
		remove_trait = forgiving					
		remove_trait = trusting					
		remove_trait = calm					
		remove_trait = impatient					
		remove_trait = vengeful					
		remove_trait = stubborn					
		remove_trait = zealous					
		remove_trait = wrathful					
		add_trait = zealous					
	}						
	if = {	#	wroth	Agreeableness			
		limit = {									
			var:hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness < -18			
			NOT = { has_trait = wrathful }				
		}					
		remove_trait = patient					
		remove_trait = compassionate					
		remove_trait = forgiving					
		remove_trait = trusting					
		remove_trait = calm					
		remove_trait = impatient					
		remove_trait = vengeful					
		remove_trait = stubborn					
		remove_trait = zealous					
		remove_trait = wrathful					
		add_trait = wrathful					
	}						

}

## Updates the corresponding level of Conscientiousness trait depending on the character related scale variable (can be changed through events or other scripted effects)
update_hexaco_conscientiousness_trait = {
	if = {	#	organized	Conscientiousness				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness >= 25									
			NOT = { has_trait = organized }					
		}						
		remove_trait = organized						
		remove_trait = diligent						
		remove_trait = careful						
		remove_trait = thorough						
		remove_trait = precise						
		remove_trait = sloppy						
		remove_trait = negligent						
		remove_trait = reckless						
		remove_trait = lazy						
		remove_trait = fickle						
		add_trait = organized						
	}							
	if = {	#	diligent	Conscientiousness				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness  >= 18					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness < 25					
			NOT = { has_trait = diligent }					
		}						
		remove_trait = organized						
		remove_trait = diligent						
		remove_trait = careful						
		remove_trait = thorough						
		remove_trait = precise						
		remove_trait = sloppy						
		remove_trait = negligent						
		remove_trait = reckless						
		remove_trait = lazy						
		remove_trait = fickle						
		add_trait = diligent						
	}							
	if = {	#	careful	Conscientiousness				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness >= 12					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness < 18					
			NOT = { has_trait = careful }					
		}						
		remove_trait = organized						
		remove_trait = diligent						
		remove_trait = careful						
		remove_trait = thorough						
		remove_trait = precise						
		remove_trait = sloppy						
		remove_trait = negligent						
		remove_trait = reckless						
		remove_trait = lazy						
		remove_trait = fickle						
		add_trait = careful						
	}							
	if = {	#	thorough	Conscientiousness				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness >= 7				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness < 12					
			NOT = { has_trait = thorough }					
		}						
		remove_trait = organized						
		remove_trait = diligent						
		remove_trait = careful						
		remove_trait = thorough						
		remove_trait = precise						
		remove_trait = sloppy						
		remove_trait = negligent						
		remove_trait = reckless						
		remove_trait = lazy						
		remove_trait = fickle						
		add_trait = thorough						
	}							
	if = {	#	precise	Conscientiousness				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness >= 3					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness < 7					
			NOT = { has_trait = precise }					
		}						
		remove_trait = organized						
		remove_trait = diligent						
		remove_trait = careful						
		remove_trait = thorough						
		remove_trait = precise						
		remove_trait = sloppy						
		remove_trait = negligent						
		remove_trait = reckless						
		remove_trait = lazy						
		remove_trait = fickle						
		add_trait = precise						
	}							
	if = {	#	sloppy	Conscientiousness				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness >= -3					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness < 3					
			NOT = { has_trait = sloppy }					
		}						
		remove_trait = organized						
		remove_trait = diligent						
		remove_trait = careful						
		remove_trait = thorough						
		remove_trait = precise						
		remove_trait = sloppy						
		remove_trait = negligent						
		remove_trait = reckless						
		remove_trait = lazy						
		remove_trait = fickle						
		add_trait = sloppy						
	}							
	if = {	#	negligent	Conscientiousness				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness >= -7					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness < -3					
			NOT = { has_trait = negligent }					
		}						
		remove_trait = organized						
		remove_trait = diligent						
		remove_trait = careful						
		remove_trait = thorough						
		remove_trait = precise						
		remove_trait = sloppy						
		remove_trait = negligent						
		remove_trait = reckless						
		remove_trait = lazy						
		remove_trait = fickle						
		add_trait = negligent						
	}							
	if = {	#	reckless	Conscientiousness				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness >= -12					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness < -7					
			NOT = { has_trait = reckless }					
		}						
		remove_trait = organized						
		remove_trait = diligent						
		remove_trait = careful						
		remove_trait = thorough						
		remove_trait = precise						
		remove_trait = sloppy						
		remove_trait = negligent						
		remove_trait = reckless						
		remove_trait = lazy						
		remove_trait = fickle						
		add_trait = reckless						
	}							
	if = {	#	lazy	Conscientiousness				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness >= -18					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness < -12				
			NOT = { has_trait = lazy }					
		}						
		remove_trait = organized						
		remove_trait = diligent						
		remove_trait = careful						
		remove_trait = thorough						
		remove_trait = precise						
		remove_trait = sloppy						
		remove_trait = negligent						
		remove_trait = reckless						
		remove_trait = lazy						
		remove_trait = fickle						
		add_trait = lazy						
	}							
	if = {	#	irresponsible	Conscientiousness				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness < -18				
			NOT = { has_trait = fickle }					
		}						
		remove_trait = organized						
		remove_trait = diligent						
		remove_trait = careful						
		remove_trait = thorough						
		remove_trait = precise						
		remove_trait = sloppy						
		remove_trait = negligent						
		remove_trait = reckless						
		remove_trait = lazy						
		remove_trait = fickle						
		add_trait = fickle						
	}							

}

## Updates the corresponding level of Openess to Experience trait depending on the character related scale variable (can be changed through events or other scripted effects)
update_hexaco_openness_to_experience_trait = {
	if = {	#	intellectual	Openness to Experience				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience >= 25									
			NOT = { has_trait = intellectual }					
		}						
		remove_trait = intellectual						
		remove_trait = creative						
		remove_trait = unconventional						
		remove_trait = innovative						
		remove_trait = thoughtful						
		remove_trait = shallow						
		remove_trait = unimaginative						
		remove_trait = content						
		remove_trait = uninspired						
		remove_trait = simple						
		add_trait = intellectual						
	}							
	if = {	#	creative	Openness to Experience				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience  >= 18					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience < 25					
			NOT = { has_trait = creative }					
		}						
		remove_trait = intellectual						
		remove_trait = creative						
		remove_trait = unconventional						
		remove_trait = innovative						
		remove_trait = thoughtful						
		remove_trait = shallow						
		remove_trait = unimaginative						
		remove_trait = content						
		remove_trait = uninspired						
		remove_trait = simple						
		add_trait = creative						
	}							
	if = {	#	unconventional	Openness to Experience				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience >= 12					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience < 18					
			NOT = { has_trait = unconventional }					
		}						
		remove_trait = intellectual						
		remove_trait = creative						
		remove_trait = unconventional						
		remove_trait = innovative						
		remove_trait = thoughtful						
		remove_trait = shallow						
		remove_trait = unimaginative						
		remove_trait = content						
		remove_trait = uninspired						
		remove_trait = simple						
		add_trait = unconventional						
	}							
	if = {	#	innovative	Openness to Experience				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience >= 7				
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience < 12					
			NOT = { has_trait = innovative }					
		}						
		remove_trait = intellectual						
		remove_trait = creative						
		remove_trait = unconventional						
		remove_trait = innovative						
		remove_trait = thoughtful						
		remove_trait = shallow						
		remove_trait = unimaginative						
		remove_trait = content						
		remove_trait = uninspired						
		remove_trait = simple						
		add_trait = innovative						
	}							
	if = {	#	thoughtful	Openness to Experience				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience >= 3					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience < 7					
			NOT = { has_trait = thoughtful }					
		}						
		remove_trait = intellectual						
		remove_trait = creative						
		remove_trait = unconventional						
		remove_trait = innovative						
		remove_trait = thoughtful						
		remove_trait = shallow						
		remove_trait = unimaginative						
		remove_trait = content						
		remove_trait = uninspired						
		remove_trait = simple						
		add_trait = thoughtful						
	}							
	if = {	#	shallow	Openness to Experience				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience >= -3					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience < 3					
			NOT = { has_trait = shallow }					
		}						
		remove_trait = intellectual						
		remove_trait = creative						
		remove_trait = unconventional						
		remove_trait = innovative						
		remove_trait = thoughtful						
		remove_trait = shallow						
		remove_trait = unimaginative						
		remove_trait = content						
		remove_trait = uninspired						
		remove_trait = simple						
		add_trait = shallow						
	}							
	if = {	#	unimaginative	Openness to Experience				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience >= -7					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience < -3					
			NOT = { has_trait = unimaginative }					
		}						
		remove_trait = intellectual						
		remove_trait = creative						
		remove_trait = unconventional						
		remove_trait = innovative						
		remove_trait = thoughtful						
		remove_trait = shallow						
		remove_trait = unimaginative						
		remove_trait = content						
		remove_trait = uninspired						
		remove_trait = simple						
		add_trait = unimaginative						
	}							
	if = {	#	conventional	Openness to Experience				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience >= -12					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience < -7					
			NOT = { has_trait = content }					
		}						
		remove_trait = intellectual						
		remove_trait = creative						
		remove_trait = unconventional						
		remove_trait = innovative						
		remove_trait = thoughtful						
		remove_trait = shallow						
		remove_trait = unimaginative						
		remove_trait = content						
		remove_trait = uninspired						
		remove_trait = simple						
		add_trait = content						
	}							
	if = {	#	uninspired	Openness to Experience				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience >= -18					
			var:hexaco_personality_value_openness_to_experience < -12				
			NOT = { has_trait = uninspired }					
		}						
		remove_trait = intellectual						
		remove_trait = creative						
		remove_trait = unconventional						
		remove_trait = innovative						
		remove_trait = thoughtful						
		remove_trait = shallow						
		remove_trait = unimaginative						
		remove_trait = content						
		remove_trait = uninspired						
		remove_trait = simple						
		add_trait = uninspired						
	}							
	if = {	#	simple	Openness to Experience				
		limit = {						
			var:hexaco_personality_value_conscientiousness < -18				
			NOT = { has_trait = simple }					
		}						
		remove_trait = intellectual						
		remove_trait = creative						
		remove_trait = unconventional						
		remove_trait = innovative						
		remove_trait = thoughtful						
		remove_trait = shallow						
		remove_trait = unimaginative						
		remove_trait = content						
		remove_trait = uninspired						
		remove_trait = simple						
		add_trait = simple						
	}							

}


#### Adds a point in the related scale and assign the proper education trait depending on the variable detected on the character

## Adds 1 positive points towards the positive end of Honesty Humility HEXACO personality scale and updates the trait if needed
positive_gain_hexaco_honesty_humility_scale = {
	change_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_honesty_humility add = 1 }
	update_hexaco_honesty_humility_trait = yes
}

## Adds 1 positive points towards the positive end of Emotionality HEXACO personality scale and updates the trait if needed

	change_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_emotionality add = 1 }
	update_hexaco_emotionality_trait = yes
}

	update_hexaco_extraversion_trait = yes
}

	change_variable = { name = hexaco_personality_value_agreeableness add = 1 }
	update_hexaco_agreeableness_trait = yes
}

	update_hexaco_openness_to_experience_trait = yes
}

	update_hexaco_honesty_humility_trait = yes
}
